resources.string: " Reading Takbiratul Ihram; That is with lafazh (utterance): Allaahu Akbar This is based on the words of the Prophet sallallaahu alaihi wasallam: The key to prayer is purification, the barrier between manners that may and may not be done during prayer is takbir, and the liberator of the prayer is greeting. (HR Abu Daud, At-Tirmidhi and others, authentic hadith) Stand up for those who are able to carry out the obligatory prayer; This is based on the word of Allah Subhanahu wa Ta'ala: Take care of all the prayers (mu) and (guard) the wustha prayer (Asr). Stand for Allah (in your prayer) with khusyu '. (Al-Baqarah: 238) And based on the Word of the Prophet sallallaahu alaihi wasallam to Imran bin Hushain: Pray you by standing up, if not able then by sitting, and if not able also then pray by lying to the side. (Narrated by Al-Bukhari) Reading the letter of Al-Fatihah every rakaat fardhu prayer and sunnah prayer; This is based on the words of the Prophet sallallaahu alaihi wasallam: It is not valid to pray for someone who does not read the letter "
